name.jp: 野望のイーグルマント

description.en: The Master's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.ar: The Master's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.br: A Capa Águia do Mestre aumenta todos os atributos base em +7 e vida máxima (HP) em +300. O Selo da Águia é exibido em destaque.
description.cns: 大师级金鹰披风增加所有基础属性+7和生命上限+300。披风凸显着鹰的印记。
description.de: Der Master's Eagle Cloak erhöht alle Statuspunkte um +7 und die HP um +300. Das Siegel eines Adlers wird stolz präsentiert.
description.fi: The Master's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.fil: The Master's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.fr: La Cape d'Aigle Intrépide augmente toutes les statistiques de base de +7 et les PV Max de +300. Le Sceau de l'Aigle est bien en vue.
description.id: Master's Eagle Cloak meningkatkan semua statistik dasar sebesar +7 dan HP Max sebesar +300. Segel Elang ditampilkan dengan jelas.
description.it: The Master's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.jp: 野望のイーグルマントは、全ステータスを+7、HPの最大を+300増加させます。鷲の紋章が記されています。
description.kr: 욕망의 독수리 망토는 모든 기본스탯을 7, 최대 체력을 300 증가시킵니다. 독수리의 봉인이 확실하게 보여집니다.
description.nl: The Master's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.pl: The Master's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.ru: The Master's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.sp: La Capa Águila del Maestro aumenta todas las estadísticas base en +7 y la HP Máxima en +300. El Sello del Águila se muestra de forma destacada.
description.sw: The Master's Eagle Cloak increases all base stats by +7 and HP Max by +300. The Seal of the Eagle is prominently displayed.
description.th: The Master's Eagle Cloak เพิ่ม stat พื้นฐานทั้งหมด +7 และ HP สูงสุด +300 ตราประทับของนกอินทรีปรากฏอย่างเด่นชัด
description.tw: 全能力+7和HP+200的專家之鷹斗篷，老鷹的樣式將顯現在斗篷上
description.vi: Master Eagle Cloak tăng tất cả các chỉ số cơ bản lên +7 và HP tối đa là +300. Con dấu của Đại bàng được hiển thị nổi bật.
